LanguageData.RPHT_HospitalBed.label: High-tech hospital bed
LanguageData.RPHT_HospitalBed.description: A specialised graphene bed designed for use in hospitals. Adjustable for a patient and includes built-in high tech equipment, it improves medical outcomes over normal hospital beds. It includes a neuro-receptor device that can modify alpha wave to dull pain and also provide some recreational stimulus.
